Question: This person Presents was parodied by Friz Freleng's 1961 cartoon The Last Hungry Cat, which contains a plot similar to Blackmail.
Hints: Equally important is this person's tendency to shoot alternate takes of scenes.
While at Fox, this person seriously considered directing the film version of A J.
Featuring James Stewart in the leading role, Rope was the first of four films Stewart would make with this person.
